"Tucano": "It's a huge relief to know we have such a strong ARKS in our midst. I hope you'll continue to help us."
"I've been awfully worried about the DOLLS still left in the Dome. We've been keeping an eye out for them, but..."
"We've gotten reports that they're resuming activity within Lower Maqaad recently."
"Even though we've repelled Lenus Retem, we haven't quelled the entire DOLLS threat yet."
"We're best off nipping these potential disasters in the bud."
"Will you help us now, like you did with Lenus Retem?"
"I'd like you to join the mission to eliminate the remnant DOLLS in Lower Maqaad then."
"The other ARKS from Retem will also be fighting, of course, but having you there will be a great boost to morale."
"I see, guess I can't just rely on you for everything."
"We can handle things with just Retem's forces, but we would appreciate any help."
"You continue to amaze us with each new victory you achieve."
"We ARKS of Retem won't falter either. Let's get stronger together, and beat those DOLLS!"
